div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1276 Dali, 1869 (297, part) Burial: c. 425-400 B.C. (Price) Contents: c. 500 AR. In two jars from excava- tions Amathus: 16 fr. Citium: 1 st.; 263+ fr. Paphus: 109 fr. Salamis: 7 fr. Disposition: London c. 440 Lang, NC 1871, pp. 1-18 BMCCyprus, passim Hill, NC 1914, pp. 105 f. Price, NC 1969, pp. 2-4
